moves.1. e4 e6: Do not know this opening. Which one is it?
moves.2... Qh4: Queen moves so early. This comes to the downfall.
moves.3... Qxe4+: Takes the hanging piece with check.
moves.4. Be3 Qc6: The queen runs back to a safe spot.
moves.7... Qa5: She tries to overload the knight.
moves.8. Bd2: Luckly, my knight protects the e5, so no check will be made.
moves.8... b6 9. g3 Ba6: Attacks the Queen in a bid to take the knight.
moves.10. Qe3: I protect the knight and the e file.
moves.12... Nh6: She leaves the bishop hanging. First material blunder.
moves.15... Nxc2+: Checks my king and forks my queen!
moves.16. Kd2 Qa5+: She doesn't take the queen, as she is down in material.
moves.17. Kxc2: 4 points ahead, but I have ruined my castling position.
moves.17... Rb8: Moves out of the way of my bishop.
moves.18... Qf5+ 19. Be4: The bishop is free! Another blunder.
moves.21. Kc3 O-O: She castles. I see that she is vulnerable on h7.
moves.22. Be4: Threaten the queen and make room for Qd3.
moves.22... Ng4: She pushes for a queen trade.
moves.23. Bxc6: I accept, as I am 4 points ahead, and will be 7 after Nxe3 and fxe3.
moves.23... Nxe3 24. fxe3 dxc6: Tries to make up for material lost.
moves.25. Ne5 Rbd8 26. Nxc6: I am about to check the king.
moves.28. Nf4: Two knights are better than one!
moves.28... g5: She is losing the king's cover!
moves.31. Rf3 Rae8 32. Ng6+ Kh7: As I said before, I get a 2 extra points.
moves.33. Nxf8+ Rxf8 34. e4 g4 35. Rf4: Now the odds are against black.
moves.41... Re8 42. d6 Rd8 43. d7: A passed pawn is always good.
moves.43... h4: The black king locks himself in! If Rc8...
moves.49. h5 Rh1 50. h6 Kf6: Another blunder. Rxh2 would be better.
moves.53. h7 Rh8 54. Rf4: I see my chance to take the f5 pawn.
moves.54... Kg6 55. Rfxf5: And now my two rooks are free to roam on the same file.
moves.56... Kf6 57. Rg8: Now he has lost the rook. If Rxh7 then Rxh7. If Rxg8 then hxg8.
moves.57... Rxh7 58. Rxh7 Kf5: At this point black resigned. If she hadn't made so many blunders, she would have beat me. But I suppose that bad luck is evedent in this game. On a final note, Cut out the blunders in your games. It will help you win. Thanks for viewing, and God Bless!
